___maskUrl.description: URL to mipmap level alpha mask

___mipmapLevels.description: URLs to mipmap level images and masks

___maxX.description: right coordinate of the bounding box for this tile

___maxY.description: bottom coordinate of the bounding box for this tile

___layout.description: capture layout data for the tile

___z.description: z value or layer of this tile within the stack

___tileId.description: unique identifier for tile within the stack

___height.description: width of the input image, if not present or set to -1

___minY.description: top coordinate of the bounding box for this tile

___width.description: width of the input image, if not present or set to -1

___minX.description: left coordinate of the bounding box for this tile
